column2: This character recently did something awkward in public, and not only that, everyone is gossiping about it!
This pious Muslim fasts every now and then, even when it isn't Ramadan!
We were so young, so innocent... and even now, so many years later, the memories of the laughter and joy we shared haunt me.
This character recently had the good fortune of eating some of the most delicious baklava around.
This ruler recently witnessed dutiful guard performing their duties most admirably, and rewarded them.
This character had humble origins as a town guard, but the experience was very formative to their zealous sense of justice.
